testCase.name: TestRecorder startRecording should start a new recording
TestRecorder startRecording should throw error if recording already in progress
TestRecorder startRecording should capture environment metadata
TestRecorder stopRecording should stop recording and save to file
TestRecorder stopRecording should throw error if no recording in progress
TestRecorder stopRecording should include duration in saved recording
TestRecorder recordCreateSession should record a create_session step
TestRecorder recordCreateSession should set currentSessionId
TestRecorder recordSendInput should record a send_input step
TestRecorder recordSendInput should use current session ID if not specified
TestRecorder recordSendKey should record a send_key step
TestRecorder recordWaitForOutput should record a wait_for_output step
TestRecorder getStats should return recording statistics
TestRecorder getStats should return null if no recording
TestRecorder cancelRecording should cancel recording without saving
TestRecorder cancelRecording should throw error if no recording in progress
TestRecorder Static methods listRecordings should list all recordings in directory
TestRecorder Static methods listRecordings should return empty array if directory does not exist
TestRecorder Static methods loadRecording should load a recording from file
TestRecorder Static methods loadRecording should throw error if recording not found
TestRecorder Static methods loadRecording should handle .json extension
TestRecorder Static methods deleteRecording should delete a recording file
TestRecorder Static methods deleteRecording should not throw if file does not exist
TestRecorder Timestamp tracking should record relative timestamps for steps
TestRecorder Edge cases should handle special characters in filenames
TestRecorder Edge cases should handle empty steps array
TestRecorder Edge cases should preserve metadata through save/load cycle
